instructions: Open tofu packages.
Drain liquid from tofu.
Blot tofu with napkin to remove excess moisture.
Cut tofu into cubes.
Place tofu cubes on oven-safe tray.
Set oven to broil on high.
Broil tofu until dry and lightly toasted, about 20 minutes.
Turn tofu pieces periodically for even browning.
Measure ketchup into bowl.
Measure molasses and add to ketchup.
Squeeze lemons to yield lemon juice.
Add lemon juice to ketchup and molasses mixture.
Stir sauce mixture until combined.
Pour sauce mixture into pot.
Heat pot over medium heat for 2 minutes.
Add salt to sauce to taste.
Add sugar to sauce to taste.
Stir sauce until salt and sugar dissolve.
Remove pot from heat.
Transfer cooked tofu to pot with sauce or pour sauce over tofu.
Mix tofu and sauce until tofu is evenly coated.
Wash sweet pepper.
Hold pepper upside down with stem on bottom.
Cut petals into pepper without cutting through base.
Bend pepper petals outward to expose center.
Wash scallions.
Lay scallions flat and cut only top layer lengthwise.
Slice scallions into thin long strips.
Allow scallion strips to curl naturally.
Arrange pepper flower and scallion leaves for decoration.
Serve BBQ tofu warm.
Enjoy the dish.
